name: MatLab Nuxt App Dev Container
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'npm ci && npx playwright install --with-deps && cd python_api && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y awscli tmux || true && npm install -g @sentry/cli || true && chmod +x .devcontainer/health-check.sh .devcontainer/start-dev.sh .devcontainer/start-servers-tmux.sh scripts/shell/start.sh'
postStartCommand: bash -lc './.devcontainer/health-check.sh; if [ "$DEVCONTAINER_AUTO_START_SERVERS" = "true" ]; then ./.devcontainer/start-servers-tmux.sh || true; fi; echo Devcontainer ready. Ports forwarded: 3000 (frontend), 8000 (Python API)'
